h1: How Many Calories in a Piece of Pepperoni Pizza?
assumptions: Standard 14-inch pizza, one slice (1/8 of whole), with mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, and pepperoni; regular crust, baked.

quick_answer.text: One slice of pepperoni pizza typically contains about 285 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 285 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a piece of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: About 32 g carbs, 12 g protein, 12 g fat per slice.

faqs.q: Is pepperoni pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 700 mg sodium per slice due to cheese and processed meat.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~50 kcal; deep dish adds ~100 kcal per slice.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie tweaks for pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Opt for veggie toppings, thin crust, or less cheese to cut 50-100 kcal per slice.
